Test.Name: two format types for the same TypeName
Test.Description: 4.4. If formatTypeInfoList[identifierType] contains at least two format type info items with equal FormatType, FAIL the test and skip other steps.

Test.Name: Credential identifier type in GetCredentialList and GetCredentialIdentifiers contains other format type
Test.Description: 7.3.1. If credential identifier type with typeName contains other format type (CredentialIdentifier.Type.FormatType) than listed in formatTypeInfoList[typeName], FAIL the test and skip other steps.
